doc.field: Labor lecture notes and materials. Cornell teaching certiﬁcate. "Bar, Bench and Table" (published play). Mediation materials. Testimonial Album honoring Manson (1956). "Automation" New School Seminar materials (1962). "Economic Trends and Outlook" newsletter. "The Constitution and Social Issues," Charles Beard (pamphlet). Clippings. Course materials. National Committee for Rural Schools materials. NYS Labor Relations Bureau materials. "The New Leader" (pamphlets). Articles on science/medicine. "Internal Union Affairs and the Need for Training Leaders" (paper). NYU Conference on Labor. Statements by labor representatives. Clippings. League for Industrial Democracy correspondence. "Goals for Workers' Education" (paper).
